desc: Whether the item can be placed in the off-hand slot.
Allows the item to place a block when used.
Enables bundle-specific interaction and tooltip for the item.
Determines if the item can destroy blocks in creative mode.
Specifies that the item is compostable and chance of composting.
Defines a cooldown time (in seconds) after use before reuse.
Specifies an array of custom script components for this item.
Extra damage the item does on attack.
Allows the item to absorb damage that would otherwise be dealt to its wearer.
Specifies how quickly the item can dig specific blocks.
Sets the custom display name shown for the item.
Specifies how much damage the item can take before breaking.
Enables effects when the item receives damage based on thresholds.
Allows the item to be dyed via cauldrons.
Defines which enchantments can be applied to the item.
Allows the item to place entities into the world.
Item is immune to burning when dropped in fire or lava.
Defines the item as food – nutrition, saturation etc.
Allows the item to be used as fuel in a furnace.
Applies the enchanted glint render effect on the item.
Determines if the item renders like a tool while held.
Specifies the color of the item name when hovered over.
The icon graphic used for the item in the UI.
Shows a custom interact button text or enables it for touch controls.
Specifies base rarity and color of the item name when hovered.
Used by record items to define music playback behaviour.
Specifies which items can repair this item and how much durability is gained.
Shooter component – allows item to shoot projectiles.
Determines if the item entity should despawn when floating.
Determines if items with different data values can stack or merge when floating.
Allows this item to act as a storage container for other items.
Maximum weight limit for items stored inside a storage item.
Modifies use effects including use duration and player speed when used.
Allows the item to be worn in head/chest/legs/feet/off-hand slots.
